sentences.en: He portrays the psyche as polycentric.
sentences.cn: 他所描绘的精神是多中心的。

sentences.en: She spent her life plumbing the mysteries of the human psyche.
sentences.cn: 她毕生探索人类心灵的奥秘。

sentences.en: His exploration of the myth brings insight into the American psyche.
sentences.cn: 他对那个神话的探索揭示了美国人的心理。
